title: Place Kess and interaction points
description:
- Place Kess NPC in a visible spot (e.g., storefront or alley corner).
- Position pickup/delivery markers to encourage short traversal.
- Add simple prop dressing around Kess to draw attention.
acceptance_criteria: - Kess is easy to find; interaction markers are within the block.

title: Epic: Player controls & interaction loop
description: Implement movement, camera, input bindings, and interaction mechanics for the demo.

title: Epic: Define gameplay data schemas for demo
description: Define and document the core data schemas/resources needed for the demo (Jobs, Objectives, DialogTree, ComponentHost conventions).

title: Define 'Demo Complete' prompt behavior
description: Document the end-of-demo prompt text, trigger conditions, and return-to-title behavior.

title: Epic: Cyberpunk intersection world
description: Build the one-block intersection map and cyberpunk atmosphere.

title: Define item pickup/delivery interaction rules
description: Describe how pickup/deliver actions manipulate inventory and objective state for the chip delivery loop.

title: Title screen UI behavior
description:
- Script `ui/TitleScreen.tscn` to list scenarios from `/scenarios/`.
- Use `ui_up`, `ui_down`, `ui_accept` to select and start.
- Add a simple fade-out/in transition when loading the map.
acceptance_criteria: - Title screen lists scenarios and starts the demo on confirm.

title: Epic: Define player controls and interaction rules
description: Specify input bindings, movement/camera behavior, and interaction rules needed for the demo loop.

title: SpawningSystem: resolve objectives + spawn chip
description:
- Resolve job objective list (direct refs or category tokens).
- Find `ObjectiveSpawnPointComponent` markers for pickup/delivery pools.
- Spawn `chip_item.tscn` at pickup marker and store delivery target in objective instance.
acceptance_criteria: - Accepting the job spawns the chip and sets a delivery target.

title: Dialog UI + choice input
description:
- Implement `ui/DialogBox.tscn` script to show speaker, body text, and choice list.
- Support `dialog_next`, number keys, and `ui_up/down + ui_accept`.
- Show short job toasts (accepted/complete).
acceptance_criteria: - Dialog UI reflects DialogSystem state and responds to input.

title: Define Title Screen UI behavior
description: Specify how the title screen lists scenarios, selection UX, and transition into the demo map.

title: Epic: Integration & demo QA
description: End-to-end validation and tuning for the demo.

title: Demo Complete modal
description:
- Implement `ui/DemoCompletePrompt.tscn` script for modal prompt.
- Trigger on job completion event; lock player input.
- Options: Return to Title (default) or Quit.
acceptance_criteria: - Prompt appears at end of demo and returns to title or quits.

title: Define ComponentHost API and component lookup conventions
description: Specify how ComponentHost stores components, access patterns for systems, and any signals/events used by systems.

title: Define Job resource schema and lifecycle
description: Document the Job resource fields, status lifecycle, and how objectives are referenced/instanced for the demo.

title: Epic: Define UI requirements for demo flow
description: Define the minimal UI expectations for title screen, dialog flow, and job/objective tracking in the demo.

title: Docs alignment after implementation
description:
- Update `docs/specs/demo-spec.md` and `docs/architecture.md` for any implementation changes.
- Add brief playtest notes if behavior deviates from spec.
acceptance_criteria: - Docs reflect the implemented demo flow and structure.

title: Cyberpunk set dressing pass
description:
- Add neon signage, holo ads, cables, vents, vending machines, trash, and graffiti.
- Use emissive materials and wet street reflections.
- Aim for bold cyberpunk palette (teal/magenta accents, high contrast).
acceptance_criteria: - Scene reads as cyberpunk af, with clear neon and grime atmosphere.

title: Lighting + FX polish
description:
- Create night-time lighting with key accents near Kess and route points.
- Add WorldEnvironment with fog/volumetrics; enable reflections as needed.
- Optional flicker animation on select neon lights.
acceptance_criteria: - Lighting supports readability without losing mood.

title: Define DialogTree resource schema and dialog node conventions
description: Document DialogTree structure, node types, branching rules, and how dialog triggers job acceptance/completion.

title: Add interaction detection + prompt targeting
description:
- Add `Area3D` sensor + `RayCast3D` under Player.
- In `InteractionSystem`, collect overlapping `InteractionComponent` nodes, filter by distance and line-of-sight.
- Select nearest target and expose current prompt text for UI.
acceptance_criteria:
- Prompts only appear for valid, visible interactables in range.
- Nearest target is selected consistently.

title: ObjectiveSystem: evaluate completion rules
description:
- Track objective and job status for the active job.
- Implement rules: `dialog_node_reached`, `item_in_inventory`, `deliver_item_to_marker`.
- Transition job status to awaiting_turn_in when objectives complete.
acceptance_criteria: - Objectives complete based on signals/inventory; job status updates correctly.

title: Implement ComponentHost API and signals
description:
- Expand `entities/ComponentHost.gd` to register `components_list` on `_ready`.
- Store components in a typed dictionary keyed by script resource path (preferred) or class_name.
- Add helpers: `has_component`, `get_component`, `add_component`, `remove_component`.
- Emit `component_added` and `component_removed` signals.
acceptance_criteria:
- Systems retrieve components via ComponentHost helpers.
- Signals fire on add/remove and dictionary stays in sync.

title: Epic: UI/UX for demo flow
description: Implement title screen, dialog UI, HUD, and demo-complete prompt.

title: Implement inventory pickup/delivery actions
description:
- On interact with chip item, remove/disable node and add item to `InventoryComponent.items`.
- On delivery marker interact, remove chip from inventory and emit `item_delivered`.
- Emit `item_taken` when pickup succeeds.
acceptance_criteria: - Chip can be picked up and delivered; ObjectiveSystem receives events.

title: Greybox the intersection map
description:
- Build a small cross-intersection with sidewalks and a one-block boundary in all four directions.
- Add collision and blocking volumes; keep navigation within the block.
- Add a clear player spawn location.
acceptance_criteria: - Map is playable and constrained to the intersection + one-block radius.

title: HUD for jobs/objectives
description:
- Implement `ui/HUD.tscn` script to show active job title and objectives.
- Update when objectives change; add completion flash/mark.
acceptance_criteria: - HUD updates in real time and shows completion feedback.

title: DialogSystem: flow + events
description:
- Load `DialogTree` from NPC component.
- Advance nodes, present choices, and emit events (offer/accept/complete job).
- Send UI updates (speaker, text, choices).
acceptance_criteria: - Dialog advances and emits events consumed by ObjectiveSystem/UI.

title: Define Objective resource schema and evaluation inputs
description: Document Objective fields (targets, conditions, completion rules) and how ObjectiveSystem evaluates them in the demo.

title: Tuning pass
description:
- Adjust movement speeds, camera sensitivity, interaction range, and UI timing.
- Tune prompts and dialog pacing for readability.
acceptance_criteria: - Controls feel responsive and UI is readable in motion.

title: Ambient audio pass
description:
- Add looping city ambience and localized SFX sources.
- Balance levels so dialog and prompts remain clear.
acceptance_criteria: - Ambient audio plays without overpowering UI or dialog.

title: Epic: Core runtime & data foundations
description: Implement the Hybrid ECS foundations and typed data resources used by all systems.

title: Update docs for data resource location
description:
- Update file structure in `docs/architecture.md` to include `res://data/`.
- Update quick reference paths in `docs/specs/demo-spec.md` if paths change.
acceptance_criteria: - Docs reference the new data script location and remain consistent.

title: Finalize Input Map bindings
description:
- Ensure `project.godot` defines bindings for move_*, look_x/y, sprint, interact, dialog_next, dialog_choice_1..4.
- Add sensible gamepad bindings (left stick move, right stick look, south button interact/accept).
- Fix any incorrect bindings (e.g., dialog_choice_4 set to `4` key).
acceptance_criteria: - Input Map matches `docs/specs/demo-spec.md` with keyboard + gamepad defaults.

title: Define input map and default bindings
description: Specify Godot input actions and default bindings for movement, camera, interact, and dialog choices.

title: Epic: Scenario systems & data flow
description: Implement systems and data that power the chip-delivery loop.

title: GameStateSystem: scenario loader
description:
- Parse `scenarios/chip_delivery/scenario.json`.
- Load map scene, instantiate, and set current level.
- Spawn Player and attach initial job resource.
acceptance_criteria: - Starting the demo loads the map and player with initial job attached.

title: Define interaction detection and prompt rules
description: Specify proximity checks, line-of-sight, prompt display rules, and how InteractionSystem selects targets.

title: Implement player movement + camera rig
description:
- Add `SpringArm3D` + `Camera3D` to `entities/Player.tscn`.
- Create `PlayerController.gd` for `CharacterBody3D` movement (walk/sprint) with camera-relative direction.
- Handle mouse look with pitch clamp and yaw rotation.
acceptance_criteria:
- Player moves with WASD and sprints with Shift.
- Camera rotates smoothly and does not flip.

title: End-to-end demo playtest
description:
- Run full flow: title -> report to Kess -> accept job -> pickup -> deliver -> return -> demo complete.
- Log issues and fix blockers.
acceptance_criteria: - Demo loop completes without errors or dead ends.

title: Create demo data assets (.tres)
description:
- Create `.tres` assets for `report_to_kess`, `chip_delivery`, objectives, and dialog tree.
- Wire NPC `dialog_tree` and `offers_jobs` to the new resources.
- Ensure `scenario.json` references correct paths.
acceptance_criteria: - All demo resources load without errors and are referenced by the scene/components.

title: Define dialog UI and choice flow
description: Describe dialog presentation, choice selection, and how job acceptance/completion is surfaced in the UI.

title: Define player movement and camera behavior
description: Describe movement model (walk/run), camera type (3rd/1st person), and any constraints needed for the demo.

title: Define job/objective HUD requirements
description: Specify where and how active jobs/objectives are displayed during play, including completion feedback.

title: Add Job/Objective/DialogTree resource scripts
description:
- Create `res://data/Job.gd`, `res://data/Objective.gd`, `res://data/DialogTree.gd`.
- Use `class_name` and typed exports per `docs/architecture.md`.
- Add enums for status/rule types; keep data-only (no logic).
acceptance_criteria:
- `.tres` instances can be created in the editor with correct fields.
- Status enums match documented lifecycle.
